abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Power Engineering
            Project are: (i) to assure the adequate and timely
            preparation of power projects, whose construction must begin
            within the next two to four years to meet accelerating power
            demand in Peru with a minimum of dependence on thermal
            generation; and (ii) to strengthen power sector planning
            capacity. These objectives will be accomplished through: (a)
            the preparation of prefeasibility and feasibility studies as
            well as bidding documents and final design, as required, for
            12 hydroelectric projects. The feasibility of the proposed
            Olmos power/irrigation project will also be reviewed; (b)
            the completion of the feasibility study and preparation of
            bidding documents for a transmission line serving northern
            Peru and preparation of a feasibility study and bidding
            documents for an oil-fired thermal generating plant of up to
            200 NW for Lima; and (c) technical assistance to improve the
            planning capability of the principal sector entity - ELECTROPERU.
